task: Generate a high-quality, futuristic marketing image representing a freelance AI agency delivering AI agent automation services to business clients.

visual_prompt.scene_description: A modern digital workspace where multiple AI agents operate autonomously on holographic dashboards inside a futuristic office environment.
ai_agents: Chatbot agent handling customer support conversations
Automation agent managing business workflows and task pipelines
Analytics agent displaying real-time business insights and performance metrics
Integration agent connecting APIs, cloud services, and enterprise systems
visual_prompt.human_element: A confident freelance AI consultant observing and guiding the AI agents through a transparent holographic control interface

style_and_mood.art_style: Photorealistic with subtle futuristic digital illustration elements
style_and_mood.lighting: Clean, cinematic lighting with glowing holographic UI elements

composition.focus: AI agents and automation dashboards as the core value proposition
composition.branding_space: Clean empty space suitable for adding a company logo or tagline

constraints: Must look suitable for a professional business website
